General.Name: SK Hynix Inc
General.Description: SK hynix Inc., together with its subsidiaries, manufactures, distributes, and sells semiconductor products in Korea, China, rest of Asia, the United States, and Europe. The company offers DRAM, NAND storage products, SSD, MCP, and CMOS image sensors for server, networking, mobile, personal computer, consumer, and automotive applications. The company was formerly known as Hynix Semiconductor Inc. and changed its name to SK hynix, Inc. in March 2012. SK hynix, Inc. was founded in 1949 and is headquartered in Icheon-si, South Korea.
